text:
[gMetis 🌿 (Twitter)](https://twitter.com/gmetisl2/status/1884656603883880498)

RT [@MetisL2](https://twitter.com/MetisL2): 🗳️ Metis Retro Grant Voting is Live

Supporting the builders making real impact on the Metis ecosystem. 

Top performing projects will receive funding based on:
• User engagement
• Ecosystem impact
• Innovation quality
• Growth metrics

📆 Voting is Jan 28 - Feb 6.

Shape the future. Build what matters.

🎯 Reward Round #135

🎉 Congratulations @DefibroTM! 🎉
✨ Thank you for vibing with us! 
🎁 You've received 15770 gMetis! 
🔗 Transaction: https://andromeda-explorer.metis.io/tx/0x88d414de7477ab63ef8419d252e168f85875155cd6d8154084fdfc2947022024

🚀 Keep shining and stay awesome! 🚀
